name: The Hustle
description: Two con women - one low rent and the other high class - team up to take down the men who have wronged them.

review.author: ilovefoodcoma
review.heading: Disappointed
review.reviewBody: Well.... I think the trailer is more funny than the movie itself. The script is not well written. Not many funny scenes and the acting..... was not impressed. At first I had high expectation because of the two main characters and was hoping to see great chemistry. Unfortunately it didn't deliver.

keywords: con artist,two word title,female con artist,remake of remake,blonde woman
